post.author: Kelly J Lee
post.content:
오늘 저한테 전화 온거거든요. 지금 일하시지 않고 계시는 분이라야 좋다는데요.
혹 관심있으신 분은 바로 resume보내 보세요.

Referred by Kelly Lee로 하셔도 됩니다.
Good Luck!

===================================================================
Here is a basic description of the position I was mentioning to you. If you know anyone who would want the opportunity (especially over Christmas) please feel free to forward my info. Thanks for your help!



Company – Blackdog Unlimited

Adult Video Chat site

-Java development with a strong focus on Web development

- Linux o/s

- programming web servlets

- 4 month contract with strong possibility of going fulltime

- $22/hr

- position to start as soon as possible



Best Regards,



Krista Culp

Senior Consultant

Huntech Consultants Inc.

'Celebrating 21 Years of Advanced Technology Recruiting'



krista@huntech.com

www.huntech.com



5160 Yonge Street, Suite 1005

North York, ON

M2N 6L9

416-730-9188 ext. 230
post.title: Web developer(Java)
